title: "you Want To Sleep With Me, Don't You, Senpai?" And She Whispered Sweetly, So I Can't Sleep Tonight Either
alternative_title: 「一緒に寝たいんですよね、せんぱい？」と甘くささやかれて今夜も眠れない ; "Issho ni Netaindesu yo Ne, Senpai?" to Amaku Sasayakarete Kon'ya mo Nemurenai
status: 「一緒に寝たいんですよね、せんぱい？」と甘くささやかれて今夜も眠れない ; "Issho ni Netaindesu yo Ne, Senpai?" to Amaku Sasayakarete Kon'ya mo Nemurenai
description:
Description :
        Bakuya, a second-year high school student suffering from insomnia, however, one night, he meets Kimidori, a first-year girl who enjoys eating cup noodles yakisoba. Kimidori claims she can help Bakuya sleep; nevertheless, she enjoys playing pranks on him whenever she gets the chance.
